item.title: [639] Item on Object adding random amount
item.dc:creator: @99rangek0 99rangek0
item.description:
@99rangek0 wrote:

Ok heres my code I have in ItemonObject.java

if (def.getName().toLowerCase().contains("herb patch")) { if (objId == 18818) { if (itemUsed == 5304) { player.getInventory().deleteItem(5304, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(219, 1-4); player.animate(2273); player.sendMessage("You plant the seed with the dibber and receive herbs in exchange."); player.getSkills().addExperience(Skills.FARMING, 5000); } } }
What I’m trying to do is when you use a seed on a herb patch you get between 1-4 herbs. So I tried doing

and that didn’t work lol…
So any ideas on how I can add a random amount between 1-4 for receiving herbs?
